title: Our Services
subtitle: Discover how our specialized therapies can help you achieve your health and wellness goals.

services.title: Osteopathy
services.shortDescription: Comprehensive treatment aimed at restoring the body's balance through manual techniques.
services.description: Osteopathy is a manual therapeutic approach that understands the body as a functional unit where muscles, joints, and internal systems are interconnected. Its goal is to improve mobility, relieve pain, and enhance the body's self-healing ability. Treatment includes a global evaluation of the patient and the application of specific techniques to restore structural balance.
benefits: Pain relief and improved joint mobility
Reduction of stress and muscle tension

services.title: Sports Physiotherapy
services.shortDescription: Prevention and recovery from injuries in athletes of all levels.
services.description: Sports physiotherapy focuses on the evaluation, prevention, and treatment of injuries caused by physical activity. It is aimed at both professional and amateur athletes who want to recover quickly, improve performance, or avoid relapses. Treatment combines manual techniques, therapeutic exercise, and functional readaptation to return the patient to optimal performance.
benefits: Optimization of physical and sports performance

services.title: Manual Therapy
services.shortDescription: Manual techniques applied to muscles and joints to relieve pain and improve mobility.
services.description: Manual therapy encompasses a variety of techniques applied directly to body tissues to treat muscular and joint dysfunctions. It is highly effective in addressing chronic pain, muscle stiffness, mobility limitations, and stress-related tension from poor posture.
benefits: Reduction of muscular and joint pain

services.title: Dry Needling
services.shortDescription: Minimally invasive technique to treat myofascial trigger points and muscle pain.
services.description: Dry needling is an invasive technique that uses fine needles to deactivate trigger points responsible for myofascial pain. It is especially effective for deep contractures, chronic pain, overloads, and functional limitations. Its action produces immediate muscle relaxation.
benefits: Reduction of local and referred pain

services.title: Postural Rehabilitation
services.shortDescription: Correction of postural imbalances to relieve chronic tension and prevent injuries.
services.description: Postural rehabilitation is based on the evaluation and correction of biomechanical alterations affecting body posture. It is ideal for people suffering from chronic pain due to poor posture, sedentary jobs, or muscular compensations. Includes specific exercises aimed at strengthening, stretching, and re-educating the body.

services.title: Therapeutic Massage
services.shortDescription: Manipulation of soft tissues to reduce stress and improve circulation.
services.description: Therapeutic massage uses various techniques of pressure, stretching, and manipulation of soft tissues to relieve muscle tension, improve circulation, and reduce stress. It is effective for both people with physical discomfort and those seeking relaxation and general well-being.
